offerConfig.title: Christmas Budget Beef Box
offerConfig.description:
The Christmas Budget Beef Box is a winter-ready freezer box designed for real family meals. Built around slow-cook, high-yield cuts, this box helps you stretch your food budget while still enjoying clean, grass-fed Ontario beef.

Instead of premium steak cuts, we focus on roasts, shanks, stew meat, and ground beef—with just enough steak for flexibility. It’s practical, honest beef meant to be cooked, shared, and enjoyed all winter long.
offerConfig.targetAudience: Ontario families looking for affordable, freezer-friendly beef for winter meals.
highlights: Approximately 21 lb of grass-fed Ontario beef
High-yield roasts, shanks, stew meat, ground beef & select steaks
Designed for slow cooking, stews, and winter meals
Save significantly vs buying cuts individually

promise.content: We raise our cattle slowly on pasture and work with trusted local butchers. If you’re not happy with your beef, we’ll make it right.
